summary: A lore-friendly, green-thumb patio for morning tea or moonlit entertaining.  The intent is that it become a place you want to be.
descriptionHtml:
Respecting the stone architecture and altitude, this verdant patio\'s ambiance changes with every hour of the passing day.  You\'ll find it decked out in weathered furniture, abundant greenery, and your very own shoutain, Skyrim\'s only, a gift from the Throat of the World, where it wouldn\'t operate for more than a few minutes.

A favored nightspot of vagrants and courting youths, your terrace may evince carousal while you\'ve been away, leaving you with some tidying up to do.  Make a wish, and keep an eye on your shy pet that he not go down the drain.

INSTALLATION
drop stuff into /Skyrim/Data/
(contains ESP + 1 non-replacing NIF)

P.S.
It\'s always nice to see screenshots posted of your characters lounging around out back.

If you like this, then you might like [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23121]Terrace Porch for Breezehome[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24857]Courtyard for Windhelm Hjerim[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26166]Deck and Pier at Honeyside Riften[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26856]Stoop Over Markarth[/url].
author: marxercise

files.name: Terrace Proudspire 1_3
files.changelogHtml: fixed issue where NMM reported ESP was instead ESM
